channel.description: Warning This is the assignment page for Lab 1. It is placed before the rest of the moduleâ€™s content so you may begin working on it as you review the content. Click Next below to continue to the rest of the module. Lab 1 - Secure Workstations Instructions Create two virtual machines meeting the specifications given below. The best way to accomplish this is to treat this assignment like a checklist and check things off as you complete them.
